original: Bladini, Lennart Erik Oskar, förste stadsläkare, Göteborg, f. 22/6/90 i Gbg av kamr. Georg B. o. Nanna Almquist. G. 19 m. Frida Alin. Engl. 29, Norge 35, Finl. 37. Div. förordn. v. badorter o. sjukh. 16-18, und:läk. v. Löwenström^ska las. i Väsby 18-19, tf. stadsdis.tr :läk. i Västerås 19-20, ord. dito 21-32, läk. v. könspoliklin. där 24-32, tf. förste prov:läk. i Öster-götl. 1. nio mån. 31, sundhetsinsp. i Gbg sed. 32, förste stadsläk. där sed. 44. Ordf. i Gbgs o. Bohus-distr. av SvRK sed. 32, led. av överstyr, f. Sv-RK 43-47. Skr.: Handl. i bostads-insp. samt ett flert. upps. i hygien o. ■socialmedicin.
translated: Bladini, Lennart Erik Oskar, first city physician of Gothenburg, born on June 22nd, 1890 in Gothenburg to Mr. Georg B. and Nanna Almquist. Married to Frida Alin in 1919. They had three children: Göran, born in 1920 and is a political science graduate, Malin born in 1922 and is currently studying sociology, Ingvar born in 1926 and is studying. Lisebt was born in 1929 and is currently 29 years old. Bladini passed his studentexamen in Stockholm in 1908. He received his Bachelor's degree in medicine in 1913 and his license for practicing medicine in 1918. He traveled to Vienna in 1921 for studies, to Germany in 1927, and to Germany, Holland and England in 1929. He also traveled to Norway in 1935 and to Finland in 1937. Bladini had various appointments with health resorts and hospitals from 1916-1918. He was also an assistant physician at Löwenström's sanatorium in Väsby from 1918-1919. He was appointed as an acting district physician in Västerås from 1919-1920 and as an ordinary district physician from 1921- 1932. He was a physician at the gender clinic in Västerås from 1924-1932 and acting medical examiner in Östergötland for nine months in 1931. He was a public health inspector in Gothenburg from 1932 and became the first city physician in 1944. He has been the chairman of the Gothenburg and Bohus districts of the Swedish National Society of Public Health since 1932 and a member of the executive board of the Swedish National Society of Public Health from 1943-1947. He has written several papers on housing inspection, hygiene, and social medicine.

affiliation.name: Swedish National Society of Public Health

publication.name: Hygiene o. socialmedicin
